_header: A maid Christ me bid yerne
Subjects: love, toward Jesus; love, divine and human
_description: Thomas de Hales, ‘A Luue ron’ — twenty-six stanzas abababab

OxfJesus29.First Lines:
A Mayde cristes me bit yorneÞat ich hire wurche a luue
                    ron…
OxfJesus29.Last Lines:
…And yeue him god endyngeÞat haueþ i wryten þis
                    ilke wryt
OxfJesus29.Attributed Title:
Incipit quidam cantus quem composuit frater Thomas de Hales de ordine
                        fratrum Minorum ad instanciam cuiusdam puelle deo dicate (f.
                    187)
